1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.7__The anathema: The thing devoted or accursed, viz., the spoils of Jericho.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.10__Ram: He is commonly called Aram. But it is to be observed here, once for all, that it was a common thing among the Hebrews for the same persons to have different namesand that it is not impossible among so many proper names, as here occur in the first nine chapters of this book, that the transcribers of the ancient Hebrew copies may have made some slips in the orthography.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.52__He that saw: The Latin interpreter seems to have given us here, instead of the proper names, the meaning of those names in the Hebrew. He has done in like manner, ver. 55.
